2010-09-08 15:14:00 9120 9125 9110  9125     43      0

   x<-x[order(x[,1])]
   window<-nrow(x)
   k<-0

   for (i in 1:nrow(x)) {
   result<-cbind(x[i,],k) #tried result[i], but got an error
   k=-i
   } 
   return(result)
